pages.text: Ever tried picking fruit from your $(l:the_world/wild_fruits#fruit_trees)fruit tree$() only to not be able to reach all the leaves? Well do I have a solution for you. Introducing the $(item)fruit basket$(), crafted with a bit of straw you can use it to right click a branch to shake the tree and drop a bunch of the fruits, collecting in the basket.
Be careful though as there is a $(t:5%)$(thing)1 in 20 chance$()$(/t) the branch snaps. This can be disabled in the config
Theres a secret if you right click on the fruit basket in your inventory with a powerful $(l:firmalife/beekeeping)queen bee$()
